Source: Kenneth Pomeranz, historian, The Great Divergence, 2000
content.question: The overall trend in sugar consumption represented in the chart contributed LEAST to which of the following?

choices.label: The growth of the trans-Atlantic slave trade
The development of a consumer society
The increase in rural migration to urban areas
The outbreak of rebellion in the French colony of Saint Domingue

content.answer: The increase in rural migration to urban areas

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
